name: Root Rage
description:
Pollution and deforestation have ruined the Earth, poisoning the world at its very roots. As a hippy botanist, this breaks my loving and peaceful heart. I will change the tree's genes. I will make a tree that is able to defend itself and other trees! My magnificent creation will save this place from the evil loggers. The last forest in the world!

Oh no! This tree is evil to its roots! I'd better run or I will be the first victim of my success...
